english.segment1: I can't believe everything I knew was a lie I can't trust myself my ears my own eyes in the back of my mind I always knew it but you always told me that you were the one you liar new defiance old alliance severed past new defiance I can't say that I always lived in the dark I can't say that I was always ignorant in my life I knew wrong from right I continue to struggle but I continue to fight but you lied to me you liar you lied to my face against all i despise new defiance.
